column4: hey guys, plasma freezes from time to time while i'm working around with kubuntu, sometimes occurs when i'm not in the range of a wifi hotspot, it might be the network manager? it's really annoying when i'm doing important stuff cause i have to wait 'till it comes back, any suggestion on this? thanks in advance
i did that, but sometimes i get help on #ubuntu faster than in the kubuntu channel
that probably would work best with stuff installed in both ubuntu and kubuntu. plasma is not installed by default in ubuntu though.
